name: Longsword
description: A double-edged sword with a blade length of around 40 inches, renowned for its balance and durability.

name: Battle Axe
description: A heavy axe with a broad blade, designed for powerful chopping blows in battle, often double-headed.

name: War Hammer
description: A blunt weapon with a hammerhead on one side and a spike on the other, effective against armored opponents.

name: Crossbow
description: A ranged weapon that uses a horizontal bow mounted on a stock, known for its accuracy and power.

name: Dagger
description: A small, easily concealable knife with a sharp, pointed blade, ideal for close combat and stealth attacks.

name: Halberd
description: A pole weapon with an axe blade topped with a spike, effective in both slashing and thrusting attacks.

name: Mace
description: A blunt weapon with a heavy head on a solid shaft, used to deliver powerful crushing blows.

name: Flail
description: A weapon with a spiked head attached to a handle by a chain, capable of inflicting severe damage through flexible strikes.

name: Shortbow
description: A smaller, more maneuverable bow ideal for quick shots and use in confined spaces, with a range of around 150 meters.

name: Claymore
description: A large, two-handed Scottish sword with a blade length of around 55 inches, known for its impressive reach and cutting power.
